I'm going to start off the highly anticipated first review by doing some secretarial duties first. We found a temporary female contributor that shares the same high standards of bathroom quality that the authors, editors, and CEO of UWbathrooms reveres, so look for posts coming from her soon.  To tell you a little about her, her name is Zianna, she's a CHId major, and reps Whatcom County hard.  If I had to rate her on a scale of female R&B singers, she would be about an Erykah Badu, just transfer Badu's soulfulness into awkward whiteness and you get Zianna.  She also doesn't have a huge-ass 'fro unlike her R&B counterpart.  Keep in mind her position is only temporary because she graduates in a month and a half, but we're confident that readers (like four people right now) will find her awkward nature pleasantly resonant in all her reviews.
